name: iron-tail
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target’s defensive stats.
